aad.name: Legacy authentication SHALL be blocked.
aad.description: Legacy authentication SHALL be blocked.

aad.name: Conditional access policies SHALL be enforced for all users.
aad.description: Conditional access policies SHALL be enforced for all users.

aad.name: Multi-factor authentication SHALL be required for all users.
aad.description: Multi-factor authentication SHALL be required for all users.

aad.name: MFA registration SHALL be required for authentication.
aad.description: MFA registration SHALL be required for authentication.

aad.name: User risk-based conditional access SHALL be enforced.
aad.description: User risk-based conditional access SHALL be enforced.

aad.name: Terms of use acceptance SHALL be required.
aad.description: Terms of use acceptance SHALL be required.

aad.name: Privileged account sign-in restrictions SHALL be configured.
aad.description: Privileged account sign-in restrictions SHALL be configured.

aad.name: Tenant restrictions SHALL be used to restrict access to authorized cloud services.
aad.description: Tenant restrictions SHALL be used to restrict access to authorized cloud services.

aad.name: Sign-in risk-based conditional access SHALL be enforced.
aad.description: Sign-in risk-based conditional access SHALL be enforced.

aad.name: Device compliance SHALL be enforced for all users.
aad.description: Device compliance SHALL be enforced for all users.

aad.name: Trusted locations SHALL be defined and used in conditional access policies.
aad.description: Trusted locations SHALL be defined and used in conditional access policies.

aad.name: Device code authentication SHOULD be blocked.
aad.description: Device code authentication SHOULD be blocked.

aad.name: Application registrations SHALL be restricted.
aad.description: Application registrations SHALL be restricted.

aad.name: Consent to applications accessing organization data SHALL be restricted.
aad.description: Consent to applications accessing organization data SHALL be restricted.

aad.name: External collaboration SHALL be restricted.
aad.description: External collaboration SHALL be restricted.

aad.name: Guest user access SHALL be restricted.
aad.description: Guest user access SHALL be restricted.

aad.name: Domain services SHALL be locked down.
aad.description: Domain services SHALL be locked down.

aad.name: Security defaults SHALL be disabled.
aad.description: Security defaults SHALL be disabled.

aad.name: Password protection SHALL be enabled.
aad.description: Password protection SHALL be enabled.

aad.name: Self-service password reset SHALL be enforced.
aad.description: Self-service password reset SHALL be enforced.

aad.name: Administrator account security SHALL be managed.
aad.description: Administrator account security SHALL be managed.

aad.name: Access reviews SHALL be enabled.
aad.description: Access reviews SHALL be enabled.

aad.name: Privileged Identity Management SHALL be used.
aad.description: Privileged Identity Management SHALL be used.

aad.name: Privileged roles SHALL have appropriate access controls.
aad.description: Privileged roles SHALL have appropriate access controls.

aad.name: Emergency accounts SHALL be managed.
aad.description: Emergency accounts SHALL be managed.

aad.name: User monitoring SHALL be enabled.
aad.description: User monitoring SHALL be enabled.

aad.name: Authentication sessions SHALL be managed.
aad.description: Authentication sessions SHALL be managed.

exo.name: Automatic forwarding to external domains SHALL be disabled.
exo.description: Automatic forwarding to external domains SHALL be disabled.

exo.name: Automatic forwarding to external domains SHALL be disabled except for allowed domains.
exo.description: Automatic forwarding to external domains SHALL be disabled except for allowed domains.

exo.name: Client auto-forwarding rules SHALL be blocked.
exo.description: Client auto-forwarding rules SHALL be blocked.

exo.name: An SPF policy SHALL be published for each domain that fails all non-approved senders.
exo.description: An SPF policy SHALL be published for each domain that fails all non-approved senders.

exo.name: Email authentication records SHALL be configured.
exo.description: Email authentication records SHALL be configured.

exo.name: Default sharing policy SHALL be restrictive.
exo.description: Default sharing policy SHALL be restrictive.

defender.name: Anti-malware policies for Microsoft Defender for Office 365 SHALL be configured.
defender.description: Anti-malware policies for Microsoft Defender for Office 365 SHALL be configured.

defender.name: Anti-spam policies for Microsoft Defender for Office 365 SHALL be configured.
defender.description: Anti-spam policies for Microsoft Defender for Office 365 SHALL be configured.

defender.name: Sensitive accounts SHALL be added to Exchange Online Protection in the strict preset security policy.
defender.description: Sensitive accounts SHALL be added to Exchange Online Protection in the strict preset security policy.

defender.name: Sensitive accounts SHALL be added to Microsoft Defender for Office 365 preset security policy.
defender.description: Sensitive accounts SHALL be added to Microsoft Defender for Office 365 preset security policy.

defender.name: User impersonation protection SHALL be enabled.
defender.description: User impersonation protection SHALL be enabled.

defender.name: Domain impersonation protection SHALL be enabled.
defender.description: Domain impersonation protection SHALL be enabled.

defender.name: Partner domain protection SHALL be enabled.
defender.description: Partner domain protection SHALL be enabled.

defender.name: Modern authentication for Exchange Online SHALL be enabled.
defender.description: Modern authentication for Exchange Online SHALL be enabled.

defender.name: User submissions policy SHALL be configured.
defender.description: User submissions policy SHALL be configured.

defender.name: Advanced hunting in Microsoft 365 Defender SHALL be enabled.
defender.description: Advanced hunting in Microsoft 365 Defender SHALL be enabled.

defender.name: Alerts in Microsoft 365 Defender SHALL be enabled.
defender.description: Alerts in Microsoft 365 Defender SHALL be enabled.

defender.name: Email Alert Policies SHALL be enabled.
defender.description: Email Alert Policies SHALL be enabled.

defender.name: SEC Enhanced Licensing SHALL be enabled.
defender.description: SEC Enhanced Licensing SHALL be enabled.

defender.name: Microsoft Defender for Cloud Apps SHALL be enabled.
defender.description: Microsoft Defender for Cloud Apps SHALL be enabled.

powerplatform.name: Data loss prevention (DLP) policies SHALL be established.
powerplatform.description: Data loss prevention (DLP) policies SHALL be established.

powerplatform.name: Power Platform environment strategy SHALL be planned.
powerplatform.description: Power Platform environment strategy SHALL be planned.

powerplatform.name: Creation of environments SHALL be restricted.
powerplatform.description: Creation of environments SHALL be restricted.

powerplatform.name: Creation of databases SHALL be restricted.
powerplatform.description: Creation of databases SHALL be restricted.

powerplatform.name: Locations for storing Power Platform resources SHALL be restricted.
powerplatform.description: Locations for storing Power Platform resources SHALL be restricted.

powerplatform.name: Sender's IP address SHALL be added to allowed list.
powerplatform.description: Sender's IP address SHALL be added to allowed list.

powerplatform.name: Resource creation SHALL be limited to approved connectors and templates.
powerplatform.description: Resource creation SHALL be limited to approved connectors and templates.

powerplatform.name: Custom connector submission SHALL be disabled.
powerplatform.description: Custom connector submission SHALL be disabled.

powerplatform.name: Power Platform tenant isolation SHALL be configured.
powerplatform.description: Power Platform tenant isolation SHALL be configured.

sharepoint.name: Unauthenticated API access SHALL be blocked.
sharepoint.description: Unauthenticated API access SHALL be blocked.

sharepoint.name: Default link settings SHALL be restricted.
sharepoint.description: Default link settings SHALL be restricted.

teams.name: External meeting participants SHALL be restricted.
teams.description: External meeting participants SHALL be restricted.
